sentences.sContent: I don't think people are really aware of just how much it costs.
sentences.sCn: 我认为人们并不真正明白这要花多少钱。

sentences.sContent: Were you aware that something was wrong?
sentences.sCn: 你有没有意识到已经出了问题？

sentences.sContent: ...you have to be aware of a gap in your knowledge in the first place...
...They help them become aware of design and technique...
...Kodak is an example of a firm that was very much aware that they had to adapt...
...we quickly become aware that things we do this way...
...Or are they even aware of an employer's legal duties and responsibilities...
...maybe aware of their rights but choosing to remain silent for personal reasons...
...there are plenty of forward-thinking organizations that have inclusive recruitment policies; are more likely to employ a worker with a disability; and are more aware of their legal duties...
...Even the traditional chefs are aware of the need to adapt to local tastes and customs...
...we need to know the rules and be aware of the facts...
...the students themselves are supposed to be aware that correct spelling is a must in English study...

synos.tran: 意识到的；知道的；有…方面知识的；懂世故的
